t: Mason Wells Acquires EastPoint Sports LTD., LLC - Mason Wells, Inc
s: August 30, 2022 - Mason Wells announced today that it has closed the acquisition of EastPoint Sports Ltd., LLC (“EastPoint” or the “Company”). EastPoint, a leading supplier of indoor and outdoor recreational sporting goods, was founded in 2009 by Mike Nally, a long-time industry veteran.

t: EastPoint Sports LTD., LLC Acquires Wild Sports - Mason Wells, Inc
s: August 30, 2022 - EastPoint Sports Ltd., LLC (“EastPoint”), a Mason Wells Buyout Fund IV, LP portfolio company, announced today that it has closed on the acquisition of Wild Sales, LLC (dba Wild Sports). The transaction combines North America’s leading supplier of tailgate games with the leading supplier of home recreational sporting goods.
